reviewText: Excellent presentation of the nastiness that invaded the church disrupting the harmony between the Jewish culture and other cultures in terms of the harmony intended by God in fulfilling that which He has called us to of bringing the Kingdom of God to earth.  Invasion of darkness in terms of hatred caused a vile wedge of hatred resulting in fear and animosity between cultures.  This presentation exposes the hatred toward the Jewish people that invaded the Catholic church with an invitation to counter the animosity toward the Jewish people and restore good will and friendship between Jewish people and those who choose to live as believers in the God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob as well as recognizing the One who came as the Messiah of Israel.
This is a fsntastic dvd and book. Every Christian should see this !!
If I could give 10 stars I would. Sound doctrine with a timely message.
